Name: malignant giant cell tumor
Definition: A connective tissue disease that results_in inflammation located_in synovial membrane that lines a synovial joint which causes pain and swelling.

Name: tenosynovial giant cell tumor
Definition: A porphyria that has_symptom abdominal pain

Name: bone giant cell tumor
Definition: A giant cell tumor and bone cancer and bone tissue neoplasm that results_in the presence of multinucleated giant cells (osteoclast-like cell).

Name: malignant giant cell tumor of soft parts
Definition: A pancreatic ductal carcinoma that derives_from squamous cells and gland-like cells.
Synonym: malignant Giant cell neoplasm of soft Parts
